trans-unit.source: Represents a pop-up window that has content.
trans-unit.target: Representerer et vindu som har innhold.

trans-unit.source: **Content Model**: Popup has one content property: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup.Child%2A>.
trans-unit.target: **Innhold modellen**: hurtigmenyen har én innholdsegenskapen: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup.Child%2A>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup.Child%2A>

trans-unit.source: A Popup can have a maximum of one child, which can be any <xref:System.Windows.UIElement>.
trans-unit.target: En hurtigmenyen kan ha maksimalt ett barn, som kan være en <xref:System.Windows.UIElement>.</xref:System.Windows.UIElement>

trans-unit.source: The following illustration shows a Popup control that has a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Button> as its parent.
trans-unit.target: Illustrasjonen nedenfor viser Popup-kontroll som har en <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Button>som sitt overordnede.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Button>

trans-unit.source: ![Popup illustration](~/add/media/popuppicture.JPG "Popup illustration") You can position a popup by setting the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup.PlacementTarget%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup.PlacementRectangle%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup.Placement%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup.HorizontalOffset%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup.VerticalOffsetProperty> properties.
trans-unit.target: ![Popup-illustrasjonen](~/add/media/popuppicture.JPG "hurtigmenyen illustrasjonen") kan du plassere et hurtigmenyen ved å angi den <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup.PlacementTarget%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup.PlacementRectangle%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup.Placement%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup.HorizontalOffset%2A>, og <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup.VerticalOffsetProperty>Egenskaper.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup.VerticalOffsetProperty> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup.HorizontalOffset%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup.Placement%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup.PlacementRectangle%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup.PlacementTarget%2A>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Popup Placement Behavior](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil ha mer informasjon, se [hurtigmenyen Plasseringsvirkemåte](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: When Popup is displayed on the screen, it does not reposition itself if its parent is repositioned.
trans-unit.target: Når hurtigmenyen vises på skjermen, det ikke flytte selve Hvis overordnet er ny posisjon.

trans-unit.source: A Popup displays its content in its own window on the screen.
trans-unit.target: En hurtigmenyen viser innholdet i et eget vindu på skjermen.

trans-unit.source: A Popup control supports animation when the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup.AllowsTransparency%2A> property is set to `true` and the application is running with full trust.
trans-unit.target: Popup-kontroll støtter animasjonen når den <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup.AllowsTransparency%2A>er satt til `true` og programmet kjører med fullstendig klarering.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup.AllowsTransparency%2A>

trans-unit.source: An application that is running with full trust has complete access to system resources and is typically installed on the user's system.
trans-unit.target: Et program som kjører med fullstendig klarering har full tilgang til systemressurser, og vanligvis er installert på systemet.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see[Security (WPF)](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil ha mer informasjon, se[sikkerhet (WPF)](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: For bitmap and opacity effects to appear on the content of a Popup, you must set the effects directly on the Popup content.
trans-unit.target: For punktgrafikk og tetthet effekter skal vises på innholdet i en hurtigmenyen, må du angi effekter direkte på Popup innhold.

trans-unit.source: The content of a Popup does not inherit effects that are set on the Popup control or on any other element that is in the parent window.
trans-unit.target: Innholdet i en Popup arver ikke effekter som er angitt i Popup-kontrollen eller på andre elementet er i det overordnede vinduet.

trans-unit.source: A Popup is sized to its content by default.
trans-unit.target: En hurtigmenyen er tilpasset innholdet som standard.

trans-unit.source: When this occurs, applying a <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.RenderTransform%2A> or bitmap effects may cause the Popup to be obscured.
trans-unit.target: Når dette skjer, implementering en <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.RenderTransform%2A>eller punktgrafikk effekter forårsake hurtigmenyen blir skjult.</xref:System.Windows.UIElement.RenderTransform%2A>

trans-unit.source: This occurs because the default size of the content does not provide enough area for the effects to display.
trans-unit.target: Dette skjer fordi standardstørrelsen på innholdet ikke gir nok området for effektene skal vises.

trans-unit.source: If more space is required, you can define a margin around the Popup content to increase the area that is available to the control.
trans-unit.target: Hvis det kreves mer plass, kan du definere en kant rundt Popup-innhold du øker området som er tilgjengelig for kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Parent%2A> property must be set on the Popup when used in a [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winfxwebapp](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Parent%2A>egenskapen må være angitt i hurtigmenyen når den brukes i en [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winfxwebapp](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)].</xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Parent%2A>

trans-unit.source: To create a tooltip, use the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTip> and <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTipService> classes.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil opprette et verktøytips, kan du bruke den <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTip>og <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTipService>klasser.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTipService> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTip>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [ToolTip Overview](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil ha mer informasjon, se [verktøytips oversikt over](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup"> </xref> klasse.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup"></xref> control can contain transparent content.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir en verdi som angir om en <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup"> </xref> kontrollen kan inneholde gjennomsiktig innhold.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup> control can only contain transparent content when the application runs with full trust.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup>kontrollen kan bare inneholde gjennomsiktig innhold når programmet kjører med fullstendig klarering.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup>

trans-unit.source: An application that runs with full trust has complete access to system resources and is typically installed on the local system.
trans-unit.target: Et program som kjører med fullstendig klarering har full tilgang til systemressurser, og vanligvis er installert på den lokale maskinen.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see[Security (WPF)](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil ha mer informasjon, se[sikkerhet (WPF)](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: This property cannot be set to `true` when the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup> is hosted in a [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winfxwebapp](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: Denne egenskapen kan ikke settes til `true` når den <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup>ligger på en [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winfxwebapp](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)].</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup>

trans-unit.source: If the AllowsTransparency property is set to `true` in an application that does not run in full trust, the AllowsTransparency property value is changed to `false`.
trans-unit.target: Hvis egenskapen AllowsTransparency er satt til `true` et program som ikke kjører i fullstendig klarering egenskapsverdien AllowsTransparency endres til `false`.

trans-unit.source: An application that is hosted in a browser is an example of an application that does not run in full trust.
trans-unit.target: Et program som er lagret i en nettleser er et eksempel på et program som ikke kjører i fullstendig klarering.

trans-unit.source: ## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`|None|
trans-unit.target: ## Egenskapen avhengighetsinformasjon ||| |-|-| | ID-feltet | | | Metadata egenskapene til `true`| Ingen |

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup"></xref> control can contain transparent content; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis den <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup"> </xref> kontrollen kan inneholde gjennomsiktig innhold; ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Standard <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup.AllowsTransparency*> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: Identifiserer den <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup.AllowsTransparency*>avhengighetsegenskapen.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup.AllowsTransparency*>

trans-unit.source: The identifier for the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup.AllowsTransparency%2A> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: Identifikatoren for den <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup.AllowsTransparency%2A>avhengighetsegenskapen.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup.AllowsTransparency%2A>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the content of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir innholdet i den <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup"> </xref> kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: **Content Model**: The Child property is the only content property for the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup> control.
trans-unit.target: **Innhold modellen**: det underordnede egenskapen er bare innholdsegenskapen for den <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup>kontroll.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup> can only have one <xref:System.Windows.UIElement> as a child, but that child can contain complex embedded content.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup>kan bare ha én <xref:System.Windows.UIElement>som et barn, men det underordnet kan inneholde komplekse innebygd innhold.</xref:System.Windows.UIElement> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup>

trans-unit.source: For example, the child can be a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.StackPanel> that contains an <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Image>, text, and other types of controls.
trans-unit.target: For eksempel barnet kan være en <xref:System.Windows.Controls.StackPanel>som inneholder en <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Image>, tekst og andre typer kontroller.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Image> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.StackPanel>

trans-unit.source: When content is added to a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup> control, the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup> control becomes the logical parent to the content.
trans-unit.target: Når innhold som er lagt til en <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup>kontroll av <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup>blir kontrollen logiske overordnet til innholdet.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup>

trans-unit.source: Similarly, the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup> content is considered to be the logical child of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup>.
trans-unit.target: På samme måte i <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup>innhold anses å være den logiske underordnet <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup>

trans-unit.source: The child content is not added to the visual tree that contains the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup> control.
trans-unit.target: Underordnede innholdet er ikke lagt til i treet visual som inneholder den <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup>kontroll.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup>

trans-unit.source: Instead, the child content is rendered in a separate window with its own visual tree when the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup.IsOpen%2A> is set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: I stedet underordnede-innhold gjengis i en separat vindu med sin egen visual tre når den <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup.IsOpen%2A>er satt til `true`.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup.IsOpen%2A>

trans-unit.source: ## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`|None|
trans-unit.target: ## Egenskapen avhengighetsinformasjon ||| |-|-| | ID-feltet | | | Metadata egenskapene til `true`| Ingen |

trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.target: Forekommer når den <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup.IsOpen*>egenskapen endres til <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup.IsOpen*>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup> is opened and closed by toggling the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup.IsOpen%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup>er åpnet og lukket av aktivering av <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup.IsOpen%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup.IsOpen%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: Attaches a child element to a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Knytter et underordnet element til en <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup"> </xref> kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: You might want to create a custom control that has the same functionality as an existing control and also exhibits the behavior of a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup>.
trans-unit.target: Du vil opprette en egendefinert kontroll som har samme funksjonalitet som en eksisterende kontroll og har også virkemåte for <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup>

trans-unit.source: You can make your control behave like a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup> by adding a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup> to your control and calling the CreateRootPopup method.
trans-unit.target: Du kan gjøre kontrollen fungere som en <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup>ved å legge til en <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup>kontrollen og kaller metoden CreateRootPopup.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup>

trans-unit.source: This method assigns `child` to the child property and binds the following properties to `child`.
trans-unit.target: Denne metoden tilordner `child` til egenskapen underordnede og binder følgende egenskaper for å `child`.

trans-unit.source: - <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup.IsOpen%2A> - <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup.CustomPopupPlacementCallback%2A> - <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup.Placement%2A> - <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup.PlacementRectangle%2A> - <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup.PlacementTarget%2A> - <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup.StaysOpen%2A> - <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup.HorizontalOffset%2A> - <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup.VerticalOffset%2A> You should implement these as dependency properties in your control so it can be used the same way as a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup>.
trans-unit.target: - <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup.IsOpen%2A>- <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup.CustomPopupPlacementCallback%2A>- <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup.Placement%2A>- <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup.PlacementRectangle%2A>- <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup.PlacementTarget%2A>- <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup.StaysOpen%2A>- <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup.HorizontalOffset%2A>- <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup.VerticalOffset%2A>Du må implementere disse som avhengighetsegenskaper i kontrollen slik at den kan brukes på samme måte som <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup.VerticalOffset%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup.HorizontalOffset%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup.StaysOpen%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup.PlacementTarget%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup.PlacementRectangle%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup.Placement%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup.CustomPopupPlacementCallback%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup.IsOpen%2A>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Custom Dependency Properties](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil ha mer informasjon, se [egenskaper for egendefinert avhengighet](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: When you call CreateRootPopup, `child` cannot be a child of a <xref:System.Windows.UIElement>.
trans-unit.target: Når du kaller CreateRootPopup, `child` kan ikke være en underordnet av <xref:System.Windows.UIElement>.</xref:System.Windows.UIElement>

trans-unit.source: Also, `PlacementTarget` should be set on your control before you call this method.
trans-unit.target: Også `PlacementTarget` må angis for kontrollen før du kalle denne metoden.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup"></xref> to which to add child content.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup"> </xref> du vil legge til underordnede innhold.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement"></xref> child content.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement"> </xref> underordnede innhold.

trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir representant behandlingsprogrammet metode som plasserer den <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup"> </xref> kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: This is interpreted as a [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_dipixel](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-dipixel-md.md)] measurement.

trans-unit.source: Strings do not have to explicitly include decimal points.
trans-unit.target: Strenger har ikke eksplisitt inkludere desimaler.

trans-unit.source: For example, a value of `1` is acceptable.
trans-unit.target: For eksempel verdien `1` godtas.

trans-unit.source: `qualifiedDouble` A `double` value as described earlier in this table, followed by one of the following unit declaration strings: `px`, `in`, `cm`, or `pt`.
trans-unit.target: `qualifiedDouble`En `double` verdien som beskrevet tidligere i denne tabellen, etterfulgt av ett av følgende enhetsstrenger for deklarasjon: `px`, `in`, `cm`, eller `pt`.

trans-unit.source: `px` (default) is [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_dipixel#plural](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] `in` is inches; 1in=96px `cm` is centimeters; 1cm=(96/2.54) px `pt` is points; 1pt=(96/72) px

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup"></xref> is visible.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir en verdi som angir om den <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup"> </xref> er synlig.

trans-unit.source: If a control uses a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup> as part of its default style, bind the IsOpen property of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup> to a property of the control.
trans-unit.target: Hvis en kontroll bruker en <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup>som en del av standardstilen binde IsOpen-egenskapen for den <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup>til en egenskap for kontrollen.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup>

trans-unit.source: For example, a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox> can bind its <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox.IsDropDownOpen%2A> property to the IsOpen property of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup>.
trans-unit.target: For eksempel en <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox>kan binde <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox.IsDropDownOpen%2A>egenskapen egenskapen IsOpen for <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox.IsDropDownOpen%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox>

trans-unit.source: This simplifies the logic for controlling when the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup> is visible.
trans-unit.target: Dette forenkler logikken for å kontrollere når den <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup>er synlig.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup>

trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis den <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup"> </xref> er synlig; ellers, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.target: Standard <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: Gets an enumerator that you can use to access the logical child elements of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Henter en opplisting som du kan bruke til å få tilgang til de logiske underordnede elementene i den <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup"> </xref> kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: When you add content to a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup> control, the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup> control becomes the logical parent to the content.
trans-unit.target: Når du legger til innholdet for en <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup>kontroll av <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup>blir kontrollen logiske overordnet til innholdet.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup>

trans-unit.source: Similarly, the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup> content is considered to be the logical child of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup>.
trans-unit.target: På samme måte i <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup>innhold anses å være den logiske underordnet <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup>

trans-unit.source: The child content is not added to the visual tree that contains the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup> control.
trans-unit.target: Underordnede innholdet er ikke lagt til i treet visual som inneholder den <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup>kontroll.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup>

trans-unit.source: Instead, the child content is rendered in a separate window that has its own visual tree when the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup.IsOpen%2A> property is set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: I stedet underordnede innholdet gjengis i et eget vindu som har et eget visual tre når den <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup.IsOpen%2A>er satt til `true`.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup.IsOpen%2A>

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator> that you can use to access the logical child elements of a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator>du kan bruke til å få tilgang til de logiske underordnede elementene i en <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup"> </xref> kontroll.</xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator>

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Standard <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Determines the required size of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup"></xref> content within the visual tree of the logical parent.
trans-unit.target: Bestemmer den påkrevde størrelsen på den <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup"> </xref> innhold i visual treet for logisk overordnede.

trans-unit.source: This method always returns a <xref:System.Windows.Size> that has a width and height of zero (0), because <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup> content is not located in the visual tree of its logical parent or <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup.PlacementTarget%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Denne metoden returnerer alltid en <xref:System.Windows.Size>som har en bredden og høyden på null (0), fordi <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup>innholdet er ikke plassert i visual treet av logiske overordnet eller <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup.PlacementTarget%2A>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup.PlacementTarget%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup> </xref:System.Windows.Size>

trans-unit.source: The child content is created in a different window that has its own visual tree.
trans-unit.target: Det underordnede innholdet opprettes i et annet vindu som har et eget visual tre.

trans-unit.source: The available size that this element can give to the child.
trans-unit.target: Tilgjengelige størrelsen som dette elementet kan du gi barnet.

trans-unit.source: You can use infinity as a value to indicate that the element can size to whatever content is available.
trans-unit.target: Du kan bruke uendelig som en verdi som viser at elementet kan størrelsen til hvilket innhold er tilgjengelig.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Size"></xref> structure that has the <xref:System.Windows.Size.Height*> and <xref:System.Windows.Size.Width*> properties both equal to zero (0).
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Windows.Size"> </xref> -strukturen som har den <> </> *> og <> </> *> egenskaper begge lik null (0).

trans-unit.target: Svarer når verdien for den <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup.IsOpen*>egenskapen endres fra å <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref> til <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup.IsOpen*>

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Windows.SystemParameters.MenuDropAlignment%2A> property is `true`, setting Placement to <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.PlacementMode> or <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.PlacementMode> reverses the position of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup>; a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup> with Placement set to <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.PlacementMode> aligns its left edge with the right edge of <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup.PlacementTarget%2A> and a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup> with Placement set to <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.PlacementMode> aligns its right edge with the left edge of <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup.PlacementTarget%2A>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets an animation for the opening and closing of a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir en animasjon for åpning og lukking av en <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup"> </xref> kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup> can only animate when the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup.AllowsTransparency%2A> property is set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup>kan bare animere når den <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup.AllowsTransparency%2A>er satt til `true`.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup.AllowsTransparency%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup>

trans-unit.source: This requires the application that creates the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup> control to run with full trust.
trans-unit.target: Dette krever at programmet som oppretter den <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup>kontrollen til å kjøre med fullstendig klarering.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup>

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup.PlacementTarget%2A> is animated, the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup> will not be animated.
trans-unit.target: Hvis den <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup.PlacementTarget%2A>er animerte, den <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup>vil ikke være animerte.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup.PlacementTarget%2A>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup"></xref> control closes when the control is no longer in focus.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir en verdi som angir om den <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup"> </xref> kontrollen lukkes når kontrollen ikke lenger er i fokus.

trans-unit.source: When the StaysOpen property is set to `true`, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup> stays open until it is explicitly closed by setting the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup.IsOpen%2A> property to `false`.
trans-unit.target: Når egenskapen StaysOpen er satt til `true`, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup>forblir åpne til lukkes eksplisitt ved å angi den <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup.IsOpen%2A>egenskapen `false`.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup.IsOpen%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup>

trans-unit.source: When StaysOpen is `false`, the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup> control intercepts all mouse and keyboard events to determine when one of these events occurs outside the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup> control.
trans-unit.target: Når StaysOpen er `false`, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup>kontrollen fanger opp alle musen og tastaturet hendelser for å finne ut når en av disse hendelsene forekommer utenfor den <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup>kontroll.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup>

trans-unit.target: ## Egenskapen avhengighetsinformasjon ||| |-|-| | ID-feltet | | | Metadata egenskapene til `true`| Ingen |

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup"></xref> control closes when <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup.IsOpen*> property is set to <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> if the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup"></xref> control closes when a mouse or keyboard event occurs outside the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis den <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup"> </xref> kontrollen lukkes når <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup.IsOpen*>er satt til <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref> hvis den <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup"> </xref> kontrollen lukkes når musen eller tastaturet inntreffer utenfor den <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup"> </xref> kontroll.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup.IsOpen*>

trans-unit.source: ## XAML Attribute Usage ``` - or - ``` ## XAML Values `double` A string representation of a value.
trans-unit.target: ## XAML Attributtbruk ``` - or - ``` ## XAML verdier `double` en strengrepresentasjon av en verdi.

trans-unit.source: This is interpreted as a [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_dipixel](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-dipixel-md.md)] measurement.
trans-unit.target: Dette tolkes som en [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_dipixel](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-dipixel-md.md)] mål.

trans-unit.source: Strings do not have to explicitly include decimal points.
trans-unit.target: Strenger har ikke eksplisitt inkludere desimaler.

trans-unit.source: For example, a value of `1` is acceptable.
trans-unit.target: For eksempel verdien `1` godtas.

trans-unit.source: The same <xref:System.Double> range restrictions apply as those that are mentioned in the Property Value section of this topic.
trans-unit.target: Den samme <xref:System.Double>intervallbegrensninger bruke som som er nevnt i delen egenskapsverdien i dette emnet.</xref:System.Double>

trans-unit.source: `qualifiedDouble` A `double` value as described earlier in this table, followed by one of the following unit declaration strings: `px`, `in`, `cm`, or `pt`.
trans-unit.target: `qualifiedDouble`En `double` verdien som beskrevet tidligere i denne tabellen, etterfulgt av ett av følgende enhetsstrenger for deklarasjon: `px`, `in`, `cm`, eller `pt`.

trans-unit.source: `px` (default) is [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_dipixel#plural](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] `in` is inches; 1in=96px `cm` is centimeters; 1cm=(96/2.54) px `pt` is points; 1pt=(96/72) px ## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`|None|
trans-unit.target: `px`(standard) er [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_dipixel#plural](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] `in` er cm; 1 i = 96px `cm` er centimeter; 1cm=(96/2.54) piksler `pt` er punkt; 1pt=(96/72) piksler ## egenskapen avhengighetsinformasjon ||| |-|-| | ID-feltet | | | Metadata egenskapene til `true`| Ingen |

trans-unit.source: The vertical distance between the target origin and the popup alignment point.
trans-unit.target: Loddrette avstanden mellom target-origo og hurtigmenyen justeringspunkt.

trans-unit.source: For information about the target origin and popup alignment point, see [Popup Placement Behavior](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
